name: EctoShot
description:
In this hard platformer, you are a ghost who needs to collect ectoplasm to proceed. Pass through 12 fun but hard short levels.

NOTE: If you feel bad and/or nauseous with the moving backgrounds, you're able to disable it on the Options Menu.

CONTROLS:

Menu:

  • Up and Down arrows: Choose different menu options.
  • Enter, Space or Z: Select an option.

In-Game:

  • Mouse: Use your mouse to shoot and control the amount of shoot impulse.
  • ESC: Pause and unpause.
  • R: Reset your character.

- The music was made by @syncopika in OpenGameArt.org
